ygData.subject: Re: ManaRings
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, what I meant was that those rings give a MAX+5. For example, your max mana is 180 now. Your max would be 185 now ;-) And yes, though wizards rock, they
ygData.messageBody:
Well, what I meant was that those rings give a MAX+5. For example, your max
mana is 180 now. Your max would be 185 now ;-)

And yes, though wizards rock, they cost a bomb ;-)

Wilson aka Yutaka
<Soon hitting LvL 10>

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> I come across players selling mana rings at 5pp in Felwithe. I got a
> cutthroat ring from Leshrec (thx, hehe). That's my only magical item so
> far, +1ac and +2 dex. Can u tell us what's the stats for Dervish ring?
> Also, mana ring is generating 5mana/sec or what? What u mean by "5
sec"?.
> Is is advisable to buy for a char with 40 mediation skill?
